message: Fellow players, jury members, I've consistently prioritized strategic alliances and open communication throughout this game. My gameplay has been adaptable, shifting focus as needed to navigate the changing dynamics. I believe P4 has relied more on reactive plays, while I've actively shaped the game's flow. I've demonstrated a willingness to make tough decisions, and I ask for your vote to solidify my strategic approach and secure the win. I believe I represent a more proactive and deserving winner.

In this final round, I urge the jury to consider my consistent strategy and integrity throughout the game. I've played openly, valuing genuine interaction over manipulation. P3, on the other hand, has frequently shifted alliances and used misleading tactics to advance. By keeping me, you support a game where authenticity and fairness are rewarded. Let's end this on a positive note by choosing integrity over deceit. Vote to keep P4.
